# debug_draw class

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:09:55.099358

---

debug draw class to draw debug shapes on screen.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/Diagnostics }` |

## Members

This class has both data members and functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Channel` | `debug_draw_channel` | Channel will be used to clear specific debug draw. |

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`ShowChannel`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/showchannel) | Show Debug Draw for the channel for all users. |
| [`HideChannel`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/hidechannel) | Hide Debug Draw for the channel for all users. |
| [`ClearChannel`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/clearchannel) | Clears all debug draw for the channel. |
| [`Clear`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/clear) | Clears all debug draw from this debug\_draw instance. |
| [`DrawSphere`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawsphere) | Draws a sphere at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawSphere`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawsphere-1) | Draws a sphere at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawBox`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawbox) | Draws a box at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters |
| [`DrawBox`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawbox-1) | Draws a box at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters |
| [`DrawCapsule`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcapsule) | Draws a capsule at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawCapsule`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcapsule-1) | Draws a capsule at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawCone`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcone) | Draws a cone at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawCone`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcone-1) | Draws a cone at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawCylinder`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcylinder) | Draws a cylinder at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawCylinder`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawcylinder-1) | Draws a cylinder at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawLine`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawline) | Draws a line from Start to End locations, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawLine`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawline-1) | Draws a line from Start to End locations, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawPoint`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawpoint) | Draws a point at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawPoint`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawpoint-1) | Draws a point at the named location, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawArrow`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawarrow) | Draws an arrow pointing from Start to End locations, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawArrow`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawarrow-1) | Draws an arrow pointing from Start to End locations, and using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawText`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawtext) | Draws a 3D text using the provided draw parameters. |
| [`DrawText`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/debug_draw/drawtext-1) | Draws a 3D text using the provided draw parameters. |
